prompts: Create a robotic Pokemon with metallic features and glowing accents.
Imagine a humanoid creature made of steel, standing tall and imposing.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and durability, with a sleek design.
Generate an image of a legendary Pokemon with a unique, futuristic look.
Make a Pokemon that has a mix of industrial and alien characteristics.
Design a Pokemon that uses technology in its design, with a focus on gray and black colors.
Give me a steel-type Pokemon that looks like it has come from a distant planet.
